documentation.text:
@notice Withdraw the maximum number of Want tokens from a pool
 @param _pid index of pool

params._wantAmt: how much Want token to deposit
params._weeksCommitted: how many weeks the user is committing to on this vault

params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info
params._pid: index of pool to deposit into
params._valueUSDC: value in USDC (in ether units) to deposit
params._weeksCommitted: how many weeks to commit to the Pool (can be 0 or any uint)

params.durationInWeeks: number of weeks committed into Vault

params._liquidityCommitted: How many tokens staked (e.g. LP tokens)

returns._0: The relative contribution of the user (unitless)

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256).details: Does not permit usage for the Zorro token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._amount: The quantity of ZOR tokens to burn

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setZorroPerBlock(uint256,uint256,uint256.details: Values to be provided by Oracle. Perferable to run daily

params._ZorroTotalVaultTVLUSD: USD value of all TVL locked into the Zorro protocol, across all chains
params._publicPoolZORBalance: Number of ZOR tokens remaining in public pool on home chain
params._targetTVLCaptureBasisPoints: % desired capture of total market TVL, measured in basis points
params._totalChainMultipliers: Sum total of all chain multipliers for each chain
params._totalMarketTVLUSD: Total DeFi market TVL across all chains (measured in USD)

params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._harvestOnly: If true, will only harvest Zorro tokens but not do a withdrawal
If true, will only harvest Zorro tokens but not do a withdrawal
params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info
params._pid: index of pool to deposit into

deposit(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit Want tokens to associated Vault

depositFullService(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Deposits funds in a full service manner (performs autoswaps and obtains Want tokens)

getTimeMultiplier(uint256).notice: Calculate time multiplier based on duration committed

getUserContribution(uint256,uint256).notice: The contribution of the user, meant to be used in rewards allocations

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256).notice: For owner to recover ERC20 tokens on this contract if stuck

poolLength().notice: Number of pools in the Zorro protocol

receiveXChainBurnRewardsRequest(uint256).notice: Receives an authorized burn request from another chain and burns the specified amount of ZOR tokens from the public pool

setZorroPerBlock(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Set the number of Zorro to emit per block based on current market parameters

trancheLength(uint256,address).notice: Number of tranches invested by a given user into a given pool

transferInvestment(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Transfer all assets from a tranche in one vault to a new vault (works on-chain only)

updatePool(uint256).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool to be up-to-date.

withdraw(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Fully withdraw Want tokens from underlying Vault.

withdrawAll(uint256).notice: Withdraw the maximum number of Want tokens from a pool

withdrawalFullService(uint256,uint256,bo.notice: Withdraws funds from a pool and converts the Want token into USDC
